review: 差评
账号验证拖沓的厉害，也不知道以前的账号怎么样了。

Overwatch was great for a while when it came out in 2016.
In like.. 2018ish it became mid due to Blizzard being too incompetent to balance the game and trying to make money with Overwatch League instead of putting resources into the game. 
Years of no content thanks to Overwatch 2 development hell just so we end up with a game thats worse in almost every aspect, without proper pvp but with greedy monetization and the worst battlepass implementation on the market.
Oh, also since heroes are locked behind a grind or unlocked via spending money, it has p2w aspects too now.

Don't waste your time with this corpse of a once great game.

Sincerely,
someone who used to love this game and has over 2000 hours in it. 
(I don't want my money back, but.. can I have my time back... please? :( )

守望先锋开服玩家
亲眼看这个游戏一步一步变成粪坑
2020年守望一停止更新
2022年10月守望2 上线 大部分皮肤高定价低质量还硬搞捆绑包
亚服玩了半年了，若志匹配机制强制给你匹配不属于一个分段的队友来使你中断连胜
如果你还对这个游戏有一丝的爱，那就跟我一起来刷差评

守望1给当时初中的我太多的惊艳了，我无法忘记当时看到《双龙》这个cg带给我的震撼，也无法忘记当时想玩却无法玩到无奈。终于高三结束，我有了电脑，当我兴致勃勃下载游戏开始了我期待已久的对局，似乎和期待的有所不同，但是我还是很开心，毕竟是自己期待已久的东西，可是没有多久就传来了守望2的消息我以为是带来新的生机，却没有想到是一坨。更可笑的的是出现了半年死两次的笑话。可能我喜欢的是当时的那个夏天吧。最后的最后只能说，烤迪克和暴雪真该死一死呀！！！

玩了两把我最爱的DJ和毛妹。
游戏结束，青春结束。。。

[list]
[*] 3+ Years of waiting for content that is both PAYWALLED and TIMEGATED. The free missions you can do are on a TIMEGATE, which means if you really wanted to do PvE without paying you are stuck on playing one single uninteresting mission for 7 DAYS, which does an incredibly poor job on giving you any reason to spend $15 to unlock the ""full"" pack of PvE missions, ones that reportedly aren't even worth replaying through
[*] The battlepass still absolutely refuses to be worth doing unless you [i]really[/i] like the decent skins within them, you can't even get currency in it unlike every other battlepass that exists (apart from Diablo 4, which funnily enough [b][i]is also a Blizzard game[/i][/b])
[*] Timegating even MORE content in a desperate effort to keep people engaged in the waiting game, remember how hero mastery was heavily advertised and shown in the trailers? Yeah that's [b]coming soon[/b], so tough luck buddy
[/list]

The only "Good" things i will ever say is that atleast with steam i don't need to bother ever touching the battle.net launcher ever again, and the linking and integration is atleast smooth, which is genuinely surprising when it comes to Blizzard nowadays. But even then, it's really hard to shake the feeling that they only released this on steam in a desperate bid to get more players. This and the actual story and lore regarding the missions are pretty well written and thought out, which is a gigantic shame when all that writing talent is just wasted on such a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ of an update

And before anyone says I'm strictly a hater, i actually have some fun in this game whenever i'm with friends (I have around 100 hours from occasional play on my battle.net account). Me and my friends WANT this game to be good, and there are very [i]slim[/i] glimses of light here and there that teases an actually good game, but it's just covered in layers upon layers of disappointment and scummy corporate decisions

Keep the review scores low, it's the only vocal way everyone can expose and see how bad of a game this is now
